SuperstitioMod:RemoveDelayHpLoseBlock.NAME: Lewdness
SuperstitioMod:RemoveDelayHpLoseBlock.DESCRIPTION: Try something a little spicy to dispel #rCorruption.

SuperstitioMod:SexBlock.NAME: Seduction
SuperstitioMod:SexBlock.DESCRIPTION: Lasts until the start of your next turn, blocking incoming damage. NL (Mechanics: Converts enemy’s physical attacks into sexual acts.)
SuperstitioMod:SexBlock.DESCRIPTION_SFW: Lasts until the start of your next turn, blocking incoming damage.

SuperstitioMod:DrySemenBlock.NAME: Semen-Stains
SuperstitioMod:DrySemenBlock.DESCRIPTION: Does not disappear at the end of turn. Blocks damage. NL When damaged, lose #ySemen-Stains first.

SuperstitioMod:DelayRemoveDelayHpLoseBlo.NAME: Afterglow
SuperstitioMod:DelayRemoveDelayHpLoseBlo.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, savor the naughty memories to dispel #rFresh Corruption.
SuperstitioMod:DelayRemoveDelayHpLoseBlo.DESCRIPTION_SFW: At the start of your next turn, dispel #rFresh Corruption.

SuperstitioMod:WhenLostDrawCardBlock.NAME: Heavy Shackles
SuperstitioMod:WhenLostDrawCardBlock.DESCRIPTION: Does not disappear at the end of turn. Blocks damage. NL When lost, draw #b%d cards.
